#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
if(a==0)
return b;
if(b==0)
return a;
if(a==b)
return a;
else
return gcd(b,a%b);
}
main()
{
	int a,b,t,c;
	cin>>t;
	int k=0;
	while(t--)
	{	
		k++;
		cin>>a;
		cin>>b;cin>>c;
		if((c%gcd(a,b))==0)
			printf("Case %d: Yes\n",k);
		else
			printf("Case %d: No\n",k);
	}
}
